image1.name: Aesop Perfume
image1.comment: I wanted to find a new perfume because my previous one discontinued. This one smells really earthy and mossy. Super happy with this one. I’m almost done with it.

image2.name: Chanel Lip and Cheek Balm
image2.comment: I tried out the one my friend has and I really liked it so I got one for myself. I think the formula and the color is really nice and natural.

image3.name: Apple Earphones
image3.comment: I used to have Airpods but I accidentally threw them in the washing machine... so I started using the wired earphones and realized they are more convenient in terms of not having to charge.

image4.name: Celine Bluelight Glasses
image4.comment: One of my best purchases so far! I think the square frames are really cute and unique. I added the bluelight lenses and it makes me feel good because I know I'm taking care of my eyes ❛ᴗ❛.

image5.name: Le Labo Hand Cream
image5.comment: I love hinoki so much I just had to get this hand cream when I first tried it on. The texture is just right too–not too buttery or oily. Highly recommend this one for people who like earthy and woody scent like me!

image6.name: Apple Airpod Max
image6.comment: This was one of my most impulsive purchases ever. I went to the Apple store to get my macbook fixed and came out the store with Airpod Max. Ooops lol. I definitely think it's not worth the price but since I have them I just use it when I study at a cafe.

image7.name: Aesop Lip Balm
image7.comment: I bought this lip balm when I was buying a gift for mom at Aesop. Just bought them to give it a try haha.

image8.name: Apple Macbook
image8.comment: I hate to admit but I can't live without it! All my work is on here and I love listening to music from my macbook.

image9.name: Aesop Pouch
image9.comment: I got it when I bought the perfume and it's perfect for keeping my everyday items together.

image11.name: Tissue
image11.comment: I got this cute tissue packet as a gift when I bought a mini Astroy Boy figure at a shop. I never took it out of my bag since and it's nice to carry tissue in your bag.

image13.name: Nikon Camera
image13.comment: I wanted to hop on the digicam trend so I digged through Facebook Marketplace and stumpled upon this Nikon Coolpix camera this elderly man was selling in The Hague! He was so sweet–he taught me how to use the camera and took test shots together.
